title: No champion capsule
body: I finish a game and i level up at 34 , i received a champion capsule , but when i go to loot (capsule didn t appear) .. A solution for this ?

replies.body: No worries fam, even though we're seeing some bugs with these capsules I can still line up the times and dates and make sure you get it. Double check your loot for that capsule now ^_^
It happened to me as well, except I never even received the capsule to attempt to open. I submitted 2 tickets and Riot deleted each one without responding to me or fixing the problem.
